A Collection in

defitem.label: Processed by: Hannah Bochain, Student Assistant and Kira A. Dietz, Archivist,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains an unbound photograph album with 12 leaves, generally with photographs on both sides. The photographs show images from Herbert Fletcher Harrelson's time at the Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College and Polytechnic Institute, dating from 1919-1922.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Herbert Fletcher Harrelson Photograph Album must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Herbert Fletcher Harrelson Photograph Album, Ms2013-054, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Herbert Fletcher Harrelson Photograph Album was donated to Special Collections in June 2013.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Herbert Fletcher Harrelson Photograph Album was completed in August 2013.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Herbert Fletcher Harrelson was born July 19, 1901 in Richmond, Virginia and died January 25, 1977 in Charlotte, North Carolina. In 1920, Harrelson graduated from John Marshall High School. He attended VPI from 1920-1922. Harrelson was married to Sarah Wilkins, born 1899 and died May 7, 1975.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains an unbound photograph album with 12 leaves, generally with photographs on both sides. The photographs show images from Harrelson's time at Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College and Polytechnic Institute, dating from 1919-1922. There are handwritten dates on some of the leaves and photographs as well as labels for the pictures.

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
